about.title: About
about.text:
Drone Spots is a platform to share your best drone flying spots all over Europe.
You can add a spot to the map, so others can find them, after you login.

spot.title: Spot
spot.placeholder: Click on a marker on the map to view a drone spot

add.title: Add
add.descriptionLong: Describe the location in a few words.
add.legal: I have verified that this spot is legal to fly at.
add.anonymous: Hide my name for this spot (not required)
add.loginFirst: To submit a new spot, you have to login first.

login.title: Login
login.explaination: You can now add dronespots on the "Add" tab

messages.notsignedin: Not signed in. Sign in first.
messages.tooClose: There is already a spot too close by.
messages.isNoImage: The submitted file is not an Image.

map.intro: This site uses functional cookies to work.
